#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int  main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    string s;
    while(t--) {
        cin>>s;
        int cnt = 0;
        for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++) {
            if(s[i]=='A'|| s[i]=='D' || s[i]=='O' || s[i]=='P' || s[i]=='Q' || s[i]=='R') {
                cnt++;
            }
            if(s[i]=='B') {
                cnt=cnt+2;
            }
        }
        cout<<cnt<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
